subject: Automobiles
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Denny Hamlin won his first Nextel Cup race June 11 at the Pocono Raceway and is now the only rookie in the Chase for the Cup.
snippet: Denny Hamlin won his first Nextel Cup race June 11 at the Pocono Raceway and is now the only rookie in the Chase for the Cup.
